game

Class Zombie

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      • game.ZombieActor
        • game.Zombie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActorInterface

    public class Zombie
extends ZombieActor
    A Zombie has two intrinsic weapons, namely punches and bites. A Zombie is created with 2 arms and 2 legs and it has a tendency to drop its limb when being attacked and shout nonsense every now and then.
    Author:
    ram, ziyaopiong

        Constructor

    • Method Detail

      • getArm

        public int getArm()
        Get the number of arms this zombie currently has. The number of arms control the probability of this zombie dropping the weapon it's holding.
        Returns:
        the number of arms

      • getLeg

        public int getLeg()
        Get the number of legs this zombie currently has. The number of legs controls this zombie's ability to move
        Returns:
        the number of legs

      • getIsCrippled

        public boolean getIsCrippled()
        Get the boolean isCrippled which determines if this zombie is able to move or not in this turn.
        Returns:
        a boolean determines if whether this zombie can move or not

      • negateIsCrippled

        public void negateIsCrippled()
        Negate the isCrippled value of this zombie so it can achieve the ability to move in alternating turns.

      • zombieIsAttacked

        public java.lang.String zombieIsAttacked()
        Determines if this zombie will lose a limb when it's being attacked.
        Returns:
        a string that represents the limb lost

      • getIntrinsicWeapon

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
        Return the intrinsic weapon of this zombie. The probability of returning a punch depends on the number of arms of this zombie.
        Overrides:
        getIntrinsicWeapon in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
        Returns:
        a freshly-instantiated IntrinsicWeapon

      • playTurn

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
        If a Zombie can attack, it will. If not, it will chase any human within 10 spaces. If no humans are close enough it will wander randomly.
        Specified by:
        playTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
        Parameters:
        actions - list of possible Actions
        lastAction - previous Action, if it was a multiturn action
        map - the map where the current Zombie is
        display - the Display where the Zombie's utterances will be displayed
        Returns:
        the Action to be performed
